titles.title: COLA Assistance Act of 2009
To provide a cost-of-living increase for Social Security benefits for 2010 of 2.9 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/15/2009--Introduced. COLA Assistance Act of 2009 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to provide a cost-of-living increase for Social Security benefits for 2010 of 2.9% with respect to the base quarter in 2009.
